message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR 

The paper deals with video classification for facial analysis and human action recognition, which are primarily computer vision tasks. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a novel weakly supervised learning method, which involves modeling the video as a sequence of automatically mined, discriminative sub-events. This suggests that the paper may also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper evaluates its proposed method on publicly available datasets, which indicates that it may also belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
